Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:33:35 UTC – Details)



SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODESï¼šPut the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALLï¼šFcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÃ‰COR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) [SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:29:35 UTC – Details)



[SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you a colorful festival atmosphere!
[SOLAR POWERED & LONG WORK TIME] These Christmas pathway lights are solar powered, no need for cables or plugs. Large solar panel equipped with 800mAh high-capacity battery can work for more than 10 hours after being fully charged in sunlight. Christmas decorations outdoor yard stakes are definitely the best alternative for outdoor decorations for the sake of energy conservation. Zero electricity costs, save your money.
[EASY INSTALLATION & USE] No extra operations! Just connect these solar lights parts and stake, then insert into the ground. Please note turn on switch before both recharging and using. Really perfect solar Christmas decorations for the pathway, driveway, patio, backyard, walkway and outdoor landscape lighting to add a warm atmosphere throughout the whole night.
[HIGH QUALITY & ALL WEATHER READY] Outdoor Christmas decorations are more durable being made of ABS material with 8 sturdy stakes. All parts are IP65 waterproof enabled, suitable for both indoor and outdoor using without any worry of water ingress or damage. It works well in hot or cold weather, so you can safely put the lights outdoors, such as garden, yard, patio, pathway.
[AMAZING GIFT & AFTER SALES] These Christmas solar pathway lights are perfect Christmas gifts for mom, dad, husband, wife or friends. They will be amazed at how beautiful they look. The packaging of the solar garden decoration have been enhanced for your gift. If there are any problems with the product or any suggestions for us, please feel free to contact us.

Light Color: WarmMaterial: Hard PlasticBattery: AA 1.2V 800mAh Ni-MHSize: 25.6 * 3.15 inchWaterproof Rating: IP65Charging time: 6-8 hoursWorking time: 8-12 hours after fully charged

LETMY 6 PACK Modern Solar Pathway Lights

LETMY solar landscape lights provide warm bright light, add magical romantic lighting to your path, patio, garden, lawn, pathway, driveway, villa, landscape, balcony and any other outdoor places.

Save Money & Protect Environment

No wiring needed, no battery required. LETMY solar walkway light is 100% solar powered. Our solar lights outdoor decorative help save your electricity costs. Energy saving and protect environment.

Tips For Usage 1. Remove the insulating sheet before use 2. Please make sure the solar landscape lights absorb sufficient sunlight in the daytime. 3. Please dig a hole on the ground before inserting the spike if the soil is quite hard.

Upgraded Higher Efficient Solar Panel

Compared to other cheap solar panels, our solar panel of solar lights use lamination technology, more durable and corrosion-resistant. Higher conversion rate than ordinary solar panels. Solar powered lights can receive more sunlight, and the lighting time is longer.

Super Bright Upgraded Filament LED

Solar landscape lights adopt upgraded filament LED, more durable and brighter than other cheap solar pathway lights. These solar path lights emit a warm light and provide 360Â° illumination which creates a romantic atmosphere.

Larger Battery Capacity & Longer Working Time

The solar outdoor path light has a built-in 800mAh super large battery capacity, then others only have 300mAh, and the lighting time is longer than others. Our solar outdoor lights can work 8-12 hours at night, while others can only work 6-8 hours.

BRIGHTER & LONGER LASTING: These outdoor walkway lights solar powered adopt the newest lighting technology, which creates a romantic and warm atmosphere and are brighter than other oudoor solar lights. Solar landscape lights have a larger battery capacity 800 mAh rechargeable Ni-MH, while others only 300 mAh. Solar garden lights can light up to 8 -12 hours and provide clear illumination brightness, which is working longer than other led solar landscape lighting.
SOLAR POWERED & HIGHER EFFICIENT:The solar landscape light outdoorÂ are 100% solar-powered. TheÂ solar path lightsÂ last throughout most of the night and will save on your energy bills since they’re powered by the sun. solar powered outdoor lights use upgraded monocrystalline solar panels, which makes our solar yard lights have higher conversion rates, charge faster, and be more efficient than other solar walkway lights.The conversion rate can be up to 25%.
ALL-WEATHER-RESISTANT & EASY TO INSTALLY: Outdoor solar pathway lights with a high waterproof level IP65. Donâ€™t worry about rain, snow, frost, or sleet. Corrosion-resistant ABS plastic can ensure the long-lasting life and durability of these outdoor lights solar powered. No additional tools are required to install these solar path lights outdoor. Quickly install these solar driveway lights by pushing this solar landscape light outdoor into the ground.
WIDE APPLICATION & AFTER-SALE SERVICE: You can use solar lights outdoor everywhere like a garden, lawn, walkway, pathway, patio or yard, etc. We provide 60 days replacement or risk-free refund warranty for our garden lights solar powered. If you have any questions about our landscape path lightsÂ please contact us immediately and we will do our best to solve your problem.

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

ã€Large Size & Colorful Lightsã€‘Our Christmas candy stakes measure 47″ x 12″, higher than the other Christmas yard candy signs, and making more eye-catching. With different lighting modes to emit brilliant lights at night. Both adults and kids will love these Christmas outdoor decorations supplies.
ã€High-quality Materialã€‘The Christmas candy outdoor stakes are made of high-quality corrugated plastic. They are waterproof, windproof and durable. With metal stakes to provides stability.
ã€Christmas Lighted Candy Decorations Setã€‘2 Pack Xmas yard stakes signs including 2 pot, 6 bowknot, 6 candy, 12 connecting stick, 4 metal ground stakes, 2 pack led lights, you can display them on front door, yard, porch, lawn, garden, etc.
ã€Easy to Install & Detachã€‘These Christmas stakes decorations are easy to install and detach, you only insert two fiber stakes between each sign, and press the metal stakes into the ground, then can display your candy yard signs. It can be easily removed by simply detach the stakes.
ã€Perfect Outdoor Decorationsã€‘Ideal for Christmas Holiday New Year decorations outdoor. They can be decorated lawn yard patio pathway walkway garden nicely. As long as you are not satisfied, we will refund to you unconditionally.
